TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mornos, title = Mornos, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mornos} }

S.FORM: Mornos Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Mornos a niyaro', 94 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 240 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 221 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 87%, Puyuma 1%, roma 4%.

Mornos Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitong ko Mornos a niyaro', 94 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 240 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 221 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 87%, Poyoma 1%, roma 4%.
